description: Click-to-call allows you to create URLs that can be POSTed to with a phone number or SIP URI and create a phone call from the provided contact information to a destination you have pre-determined.

auth_required.description: Determines if this click to call requires valid auth-tokens when invoked

bypass_media.description: Default bypass media mode (The string type is deprecated, please use this as a boolean)

custom_application_vars.description: Key-value pairs to set as custom_application_vars on the channel

in.description: Custom SIP Headers to be applied to calls inbound to Kazoo from the endpoint

out.description: Custom SIP Headers to be applied to calls outbound from Kazoo to the endpoint

custom_sip_headers.description: A property list of SIP headers

dial_first.description: Determines what will be dialed first: extension or contact

extension.description: The extension to connect to when the click to call is invoked

ignore_early_media.description: The option to determine if early media from the endpoint should always be ignored

music_on_hold.description: The music on hold parameters used if not a property of the device owner

media_id.description: The ID of a media object that should be used as the music on hold

name.description: A friendly name for the click to call

outbound_callee_id_name.description: Callee ID Name of the device calling out to the contact number

outbound_callee_id_number.description: Callee ID Number of the device calling out to the contact number

presence_id.description: Static presence ID (used instead of SIP username)

throttle.description: The rate that this click to call can be invoked

timeout.description: How long, in seconds, to wait for the call to progress

whitelist.description: A list of regular expressions that the click to call can dial to
